name: Escape the lab (itch) (2BsPls)
description:
See how far you can make it in your attempt to escape the lab with your trusty robot friend. In this platformer you will encounter obstacles to overcome as well as puzzles which can effect the speed of your run depending on the result. Screenshot your score and share it with your friends to see who can make it the furthest to freedom!

How to play:

Space - Jump
WASD - Move the robot within a maze
Left click - Activate your robots shield to protect yourself from incoming lasers!
Left click - Use this to click and drag cables to match colours
